T02D1901:287a-1: sha da aam ga yo ga n'a ma /
T02D1901:287a-3: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1901:287a-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1901:287a-5: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1901:287a-6: de la thig le dang phra mo'i sbyor ba ni
T02D1901:287a-7: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste gong ma ni bskyed pa'i
T02D1901:287a-8: rim pa'o // bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa
T02D1901:287a-9: 'di gnyis rig pas grub pa'i yan lag drug pa'i
T02D1901:287b-0: go @287b rims kho nas bsgom ste /
T02D1901:287b-1: gzhan du na yang dag pa'i grub pa mi 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa yang rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D1901:287b-2: bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni //
T02D1901:287b-3: grub pa mchog ni byas nas su //
T02D1901:287b-4: bsgrub par bya yis gzhan du ni //
T02D1901:287b-6: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1901:287b-7: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1901:287b-8: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1901:287b-9: sbyor ba yan lag drug tu 'dod //
T02D1901:287b-11: de la mig la sogs pa'i 'grel pa can rnam par shes pa lnga'o //
T02D1901:287b-12: de rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la so
T02D1901:287b-13: sor sdud pa ni bkug nas yang dag par dul
T02D1901:287b-14: bar byed pa gang yin pa de so sor sdud
T02D1901:287b-15: pa'o // yang na lha nyid kyi tshul du yul gzung ba ni so sor sdud pa'o //
T02D1901:287b-16: bsam gtan ni so sor sdud pa'i go rims kyis
T02D1901:287b-17: yid kyi rnam par shes pa lag nyid du bsgom
T02D1901:287b-18: pa'o // de yang rnam par rtog pa dang /
T02D1901:287b-22: sems rtse gcig pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1901:287b-23: de la snod dang bcud kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas
T02D1901:287b-24: pa bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rjer brtags pa
T02D1901:287b-25: nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D1901:287b-26: de kho na la brten pa nyid kyis nges pa ni rnam par dpyod pa'o //
T02D1901:287b-27: rnam par dpyod pas de rang de'i lha nyid du dmigs shing yid bde ba ni dga' ba'o //
T02D1901:287b-28: dga' ba bsgoms pas lha la sems zin pa ni bde ba'o //
T02D1901:287b-29: bde ba dang ldan pa'i sems ting nge 'dzin du
T02D1901:287b-30: 'gyur ba'i phyir log pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa sna
T02D1901:287b-31: tshogs la dmigs pa'i mi shes pa 'byung ba zad
T02D1901:287b-32: pas 'dod pa'i lha kho na la dmigs pa'i sems
T02D1901:287b-33: ni rtse gcig pa nyid do zhes bya ba bsam
T02D1901:287b-34: gtan yan lag lnga po de ni bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1901:287b-35: pa'o // srog rtsol la sogs pas rdzogs rim bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di yin te /
T02D1901:287b-36: me long lta bu mnyam pa nyid /
T02D1901:287b-39: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba lnga'i rgyu yin pas /
T02D1901:287b-40: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin me rlung sa chu nam
T02D1901:287b-41: mkha'i rang bzhin yin pas 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1901:287b-42: srog rtsol thur du rgyu ba'i bya ba byas te
T02D1901:288a-0: / @288a * // yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam byang chub sems kyi thig le
T02D1901:288a-1: gong bu'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i sna rtser phab nas
T02D1901:288a-2: gong du gsungs pa'i so sor sdud pa dang /
T02D1901:288a-3: bsam gtan yan lag lnga'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1901:288a-4: thig le'i sbyor ba 'di ni srog rlung phyi rol
T02D1901:288a-5: du rgyu ba zlog par byed pas rgyud phyi ma
T02D1901:288a-6: las srog rtsol zhes brjod do //
T02D1901:288a-7: 'di yang nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1901:288a-8: snying ga'i thig le la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1901:288a-9: bye brag tu bsam gtan 'di lta bu'i stobs kyis
T02D1901:288a-10: rom dang brkyang mar rlung rgyu ba la sogs te
T02D1901:288a-11: / dbu mar srog rlung rgyu ba ni srog rtsol yin no //
T02D1901:288a-12: de nas snying gar mam yig kyang pa bsams te /
T02D1901:288a-13: de'i thig le la srog rab tu 'jug par bsgoms
T02D1901:288a-14: pas gzung 'dzin srog rtsol dang bcas pa nyams pa'i
T02D1901:288a-15: phyir stong nyid dang ro gcig pas sangs rgyas thams
T02D1901:288a-16: cad kyi rang bzhin zhi ba sems rin po che
T02D1901:288a-17: snang ba tsam nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od gsal
T02D1901:288a-18: nyid du gyur pa la gang srog rlung brtan par
T02D1901:288a-20: 'di yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D1901:288a-21: rdo rje'i sna'i rtse mor bsgoms pa'i phra mo'i sbyor ba'am /
T02D1901:288a-22: gtum mo la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la gsungs ma
T02D1901:288a-23: thag pa'i rim pas gang srog rlung brtan par gyur
T02D1901:288a-26: du ba srin bu me khyer mar me /
T02D1901:288a-27: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i rtags lnga mthong bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D1901:288a-28: / de nas srog rtsol dang bcas pa'i sems 'od
T02D1901:288a-29: gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis gang tshe sems brtan par
T02D1901:288a-31: smon lam gyi mthus bsgoms pa'i lha dran te /
T02D1901:288a-32: de la yang bsgoms pa'i lha phra ba'i sbyor ba
T02D1901:288a-33: las sgom pa pos 'od zer spro bar byed pa
T02D1901:288a-35: 'od de dang bcas pa'i ba spu'i bu ga re re rnams kyis phung po khams dang /
T02D1901:288a-36: skye mched la sogs pa lha'i rang bzhin spros pa
T02D1901:288a-37: ni rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba dgongs pa
T02D1901:288a-38: can yin no // dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
T02D1901:288a-39: brtan pa rin chen spro bar bya //
T02D1901:288b-0: @288b mi brtan pas ni spro mi bya //
T02D1901:288b-1: rab mchog sprin rnams kyis spro bya //
T02D1901:288b-2: sangs rgyas ye shes mnyam 'od kyis //
T02D1901:288b-4: de nas phung po khams dang skye mched kyi rang
T02D1901:288b-5: bzhin spros pa'i chos thams cad kyi ngo bo lha
T02D1901:288b-6: rnams 'od du byas nas 'od zer rnams kyang gsungs
T02D1901:288b-7: pa'i sbyor ba las phra ba'i rnal 'byor stong pa
T02D1901:288b-8: dang / snying rje mi byed pa'i rang bzhin la dril ba'i tshul du bsdus nas /
T02D1901:288b-9: skad cig gis rang rig pa'i ye shes 'byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1901:288b-10: rgyud gzhan nas bstan pa dang brgyud pa'i rim pa las byung ba'i bshad pa 'di kho na'o //
